alert.note: Alert for Big Stone; Traverse (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 01 at 2:49PM CST until December 02 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 9 PM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of one inch to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of west central Minnesota and northeast South Dakota. * WHEN...From 10 AM to 9 PM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Minnesota, the latest road conditions can be obtained at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1. In South Dakota, the latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
